org.deeplearning4j.scaleout.actor.core.actor

Class BatchActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • org.deeplearning4j.scaleout.actor.core.actor.BatchActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor, DeepLearningConfigurable

    public class BatchActor
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
implements DeepLearningConfigurable
    Handles the data iterator. This includes disseminating new data sets to the cluster.
